simplified_text:
The article I’m talking about is by Ron White. It’s called “How to Memorize a Deck of Cards with Superhuman Speed.” 

You can find it online on a website called The Art of Manliness. It was posted on June 1, 2012. 

Here’s the link if you want to check it out: http://www.artofmanliness.com/2012/06/01/how-to-memorize-a-deck-of-cards/.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** This passage talks about an article by Ron White on how to quickly memorize a deck of cards. It provides a link to the article for those interested in learning more.
